wrongPowder.gui
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  wrongPowder.gui.GuiRect
      wrongPowder.gui.Button
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checkbox, IconButton, Panel, PushButton, ToggleButton
public class Button
extends GuiRect

Button class contains toggle and push methode. Also the class store colorOn and colorOff variables.

Method Detail

toggle

public void toggle(int mx,
                   int my)
Set the toggle status variable if mouse is over rectangle. Set the color of GUI element.

Parameters:
mx - Mouse x position.
my - Mouse y position.

press

public void press(int mx,
                  int my,
                  int s)
Set the press status variable if mouse is over rectangle and pressed. Set the color of GUI element.

Parameters:
mx - Mouse x position.
my - Mouse y position.
s - The status.
